name: Killing Hero
description:
Play as the boss of a donjon; place your units and traps to defeat the hero before he accesses and kill you.

Killing Hero is our first game, made during a game jam, in a week, using Unity.  The theme of the game jam was "From the villain's point of view", and we had the constraint to make it monochrome.

It's a puzzle game.

I hope you will enjoy this version of the game, because we are planning to work more on it... Follow us to stay informed about the updates!
